name: deportable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A deportable person can be deported (= forced to leave a country), and a deportable crime is one that someone can be deported for: deportable alien His conviction for armed robbery makes him a deportable alien. They were denied asylum and deemed deportable.deportable offense His drug conviction is a deportable offense.
More examplesFewer examplesNew immigration policies focus on detaining and removing deportable immigrants.A judge will decide whether they are eligible to remain in the United States, or are deportable.Although he has been deemed deportable, he has no country to go to. The administration made the argument that these crimes should be considered deportable crimes.
